display_long_description:
Step into a high-intensity VR world where blocks fall from the sky — and your fists are the only answer.
SmashBox VR is a no-music, no-rules boxing workout built for gamers who want to sweat, crush, and keep coming back for one more round. Each block has its own health bar, and only your speed and power can break it before the timer runs out. Smash it, and a tougher one drops. Fail, and the challenge resets — simple, brutal, and addictive.

SmashBox VR adapts to your pace for a true HIIT-style workout in virtual reality. Whether you’re warming up for a PvP boxing match, stress-smashing after work, or chasing your next endurance streak, this is your cube-breaking dojo.

Features:
🧱 20 unique block types with distinct feel and physics
⏱ Timed smash rounds — break it or retry
🔥 HIIT without music — pure focus and flow
⚙️ Progressive challenge — harder cubes, same clock
